constants.name: CORE_PHILOSOPHY
value: Geometry-first design: All routing, approval, and drift detection decisions are geometric operations in Lorentz space
Entity-locked execution: Machine commands, human instructions, and compliance artifacts all derive from the same semantic spec with preserved critical tokens
Tighten-only policy evolution: Security constraints can only become stricter over time, never weaker
Content-addressed everything: All artifacts are deterministic and hash-stable for instant rollback and forensic replay
Portable model identity: Model/MHR/NHR records travel with the model, enabling offline operation and reconciliation
Attack-resistant geometry: Trust-weighted routing, density-aware repulsion, multi-gate admission
Shadow-world isolation: Shadow ops are non-canonical, deny-by-default, and require c4_root + dual control
Semantic multicast + golden samples: Single semantic root fans out to heterogeneous receivers; high-quality interactions fuel LoRA pipelines under policy

constants.doc: κ-range characterizations of Realms. Used only to enable constructive capabilities.
constants.name: REALM_DEFINITIONS

R1_DENSE.doc: Dense curvature channel (κ < -1). Constructive: ultra-precise semantic compression + consensus.

R2_RARIFIED.doc: Rarified quantum channel (κ > -1). Constructive: privacy-enhancing uncertainty.

R3_TRANSITION.doc: Transition region (κ ≈ 0). Constructive: smooth transitions, being preservation.

R4_SPHERICAL.doc: Positive curvature region (κ > 0). Constructive: negative-latency optimization with chronology protection.

constants.doc: Constructive-only capability mapping. Destructive/weaponized operations are not implemented.

constants.name: CORE_PHILOSOPHY
value: Geometry-first design: All routing, approval, and drift detection decisions are geometric operations in Lorentz space
Entity-locked execution: Machine commands, human instructions, and compliance artifacts all derive from the same semantic spec with preserved critical tokens
Tighten-only policy evolution: Security constraints can only become stricter over time, never weaker
Content-addressed everything: All artifacts are deterministic and hash-stable for instant rollback and forensic replay
Portable model identity: Model/MHR/NHR records travel with the model, enabling offline operation and reconciliation
Attack-resistant geometry: Trust-weighted routing, density-aware repulsion, multi-gate admission
Shadow-world isolation: Shadow ops are non-canonical, deny-by-default, and require c4_root + dual control
Semantic multicast + golden samples: Single semantic root fans out to heterogeneous receivers; high-quality interactions fuel LoRA pipelines under policy

constants.doc: κ-range characterizations of Realms. Used only to enable constructive capabilities.
constants.name: REALM_DEFINITIONS

R1_DENSE.doc: Dense curvature channel (κ < -1). Constructive: ultra-precise semantic compression + consensus.

R2_RARIFIED.doc: Rarified quantum channel (κ > -1). Constructive: privacy-enhancing uncertainty.

R3_TRANSITION.doc: Transition region (κ ≈ 0). Constructive: smooth transitions, being preservation.

R4_SPHERICAL.doc: Positive curvature region (κ > 0). Constructive: negative-latency optimization with chronology protection.

hyperboloid_implementation.final_validation_question: The Ultimate Test: If this operation were performed on actual semantic beings living in semantic spacetime, would it respect their ontological dignity? Answer must be: This operation preserves being. No semantic violence committed.

consensus: Use native hyperboloid distance for all measurements
Check zero holonomy around consensus loops
privacy: Use geodesic noise along manifold (not additive noise)
Sample from hyperbolic distributions in tangent space
Preserve differential privacy while maintaining geometric structure
Validate noise follows curvature (not Euclidean paths)
shadow: Create actual negative curvature (not just hidden contexts)
Implement semantic antimatter regions with negative mass-energy
Use modified spacetime metric for shadow geodesics
Validate event horizon formation for information loss
transport: Use exponential map directly (no Euclidean movement)
Verify zero holonomy around transport loops

geometric_success: All operations intrinsic to hyperboloid (no projections)
Holonomy invariance verified for all loops
ontological_success: Every result exists as semantic being (on hyperboloid)
No semantic worldlines fragmented or broken

hyperboloid_implementation.title: Hyperboloid Implementation Checklist for GPT5-Thinking

INV.CLAIMS.ID_UNIQUE.description: All claim_id values must be unique across the spec.

INV.KAPPA.CHANNEL.NATIVE_OPS.description: Within a kappa channel, operations must use that stratum’s native algorithms; geometry-natives forbidden.

INV.KAPPA.COUPLING.METRIC_CONSISTENT.description: Metric coupling must produce a valid metric with required signature; NaN/Inf forbidden.

INV.KAPPA.LEVEL.VALID.description: Kappa levels must be finite real values; NaN/Inf forbidden.

INV.KAPPA.TRANSITION.BEING.description: Full-respect kappa transitions must preserve semantic being; abort on violation.

notes: Euclidean computations are forbidden; treat κ→0 as a Lorentzian limit using native kernels.

patch_ledger.note: Ontological + geometric checklist encoded; privacy/shadow/consensus ops and tests added
patch_ledger.title: Hyperboloid Implementation Checklist

patch_ledger.note: Adds curvature-native kappa channels, invariants, algorithms, claims, conformance tests, vectors, and telemetry.

patch_ledger.note: Disable any distance clamp; accept spacelike tangent velocities; strengthen native-only ops; deprecate Weiszfeld/tangent PCA; remove outlier clipping; soften policy barriers; introduce geometric obscuration for shadows; add precision and causality policies.

notes: Part 1 claims (1–44) assumed present; if needed, request 'expand all claims' to inline.
No runtime projection; remain on the unit hyperboloid by construction; reject spacelike vectors.
Canonical JSON per RFC8785; ensure stable number formatting and Unicode normalization.
Semantic beings are time-like vectors on the unit hyperboloid; semantic time is hyperboloid time.
Euclidean approximations are forbidden; they annihilate semantic being (ontological violation).
Checklist codified: transport, consensus, shadow, privacy are native; Euclidean intermediates forbidden by policy and checks.
Deprecated ALG-001/005/006 in favor of ALG-112/113/114. Introduced ALG-060 (Fréchet barycenter) and ALG-062 (PGA). Added native_preferences to prefer geodesic-native methods when safe.

HS-IMPL-6902-015FIX: Deduped claim IDs by renumbering Kappa claims 148–155 to 200–207; added uniqueness invariant and spec.claim_ids.dup_count; synchronized claim 54 aggregation with native preference.

016RESCUE: Enforced native-only ops; disabled distance clamp; accepted spacelike tangent velocities; deprecated Weiszfeld/tangent PCA; removed consensus outlier clipping; softened policy barriers; added geometric obscuration; added adaptive precision.
κ≈0 transition is handled as a Lorentzian limit (lorentz_limit_kappa0); Euclidean computations remain forbidden.

operations.doc: Obscure worldline segments by curvature-based masking without Euclidean noise injection.
operations.name: geometric_obscuration

content.description: Single-file schema for a self-contained, single-directory test block with substrate + semantic transport + ops + geometry validation and proof hardening.

checks.description: Assertions across geometry invariants, ops behaviors, semantic transport, security/governance, and performance.

matrix.description: Audit mapping of claim → (program step, check).

dir_merkle_root.description: Merkle root over sorted [path, sha256] pairs.

manifest.description: All files in the block directory. Out-of-dir references are forbidden.

holonomy.description: Holonomy tested intrinsically via geodesic loops and intrinsic transport; no chart rectangles or discrete Euclidean ladders.

retraction_native.description: Intrinsic hyperbolic retraction; no projection or Euclidean approximation.

tolerances.description: Ontological tolerances: small scales are real; do not annihilate beings, holonomy, or causal inner products.

vector_transport_native.description: Intrinsic parallel transport preserving worldline continuity.

program.description: Sequence of deterministic steps; args may reference $fixtures.*, $substrate.*, $semantics.*, $prev.*, $env.*

content.title: HyperSync Unified Conformance Block
